panels.description:
Load times between the moment the app is initialized and the moment the target screen (Home, Channel or Thread) is shown in the screen.

Each point in the graph shows the percentile of the  events during the last hour.
panels.title: Load

panels.description:
Load times between the moment the app is initialized and the moment the target screen (Home, Channel or Thread) is shown in the screen.

These values represent the percentile of all events since the last metrics restart.
panels.title: Load lifetime percentiles

panels.description:
Load times between the moment the app is initialized and the moment the target screen (Home, Channel or Thread) is shown in the screen.

This graph represents all events generated since the last metrics restart.
panels.title: # Events load

panels.description:
Load times between the moment the app is initialized and the moment the target screen (Home, Channel or Thread) is shown in the screen.

These numbers represent the number of events since the last metrics restart.
panels.title: # Events Load

panels.description:
Channel switch represents the time between the user clicks on a channel name, and the app shows the latest post in that channel.

Each point in the graph shows the percentile of the  events during the last hour.
panels.title: Channel Switch

panels.description:
Channel switch represents the time between the user clicks on a channel name, and the app shows the latest post in that channel.

These values represent the percentile of all events since the last metrics restart.
panels.title: Channel switch lifetime percentiles

panels.description:
Team switch represents the time between the user taps on a team, and the full category screen changes to the one of the new team.

Each point in the graph shows the percentile of the  events during the last hour.
panels.title: Mobile Team switch

panels.description:
Team switch represents the time between the user taps on a team, and the full category screen changes to the one of the new team.

These values represent the percentile of all events since the last metrics restart.
panels.title: Team Switch lifetime percentiles
